events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to assist you through the application process for the engineering role.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and we are impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening feedback. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next week. Please prepare for in-depth coding and system design questions.
